TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Windows.Data.BindingBase

summary.span: Provides high-level access to the definition of a binding, which connects the properties of binding target objects (typically, WPF elements), and any data source (for example, a database, an XML file, or any object that contains data).

span.span: Provides high-level access to the definition of a binding, which connects the properties of binding target objects (typically, WPF elements), and any data source (for example, a database, an XML file, or any object that contains data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 資料繫結在資料的展示和互動上，提供應用程式簡單而一致的方式。 data binding provides a simple and consistent way for applications to present and interact with data. 資料繫結可讓您同步處理兩個不同的物件屬性的值。Data binding enables you to synchronize the values of the properties of two different objects. 若要建立繫結，請使用類別或其中一個繼承的類別。To establish a binding, use the class or one of the other classes that inherit . 哪些物件不論您要繫結和您的資料來源的本質，每個繫結會遵循下圖所說明的模型。Regardless of what object you are binding and the nature of your data source, each binding follows the model illustrated by the following figure. ![基本資料繫結圖表](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "基本資料繫結圖表")![Basic data binding diagram](~/add/media/databindingmostbasic.png "Basic data binding diagram") 該圖示範下列基本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結概念。The figure demonstrates the following fundamental [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding concepts. - 每個繫結通常會有四個元件： 繫結目標物件、 目標屬性、 繫結來源，並有中要使用的繫結來源的值。Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a to the value in the binding source to use. 比方說，如果您想要繫結的內容若要將 Employee 物件的 Name 屬性，您的目標物件是，目標屬性是屬性，要使用的值是名稱，且來源物件的員工物件。For example, if you want to bind the content of a to the Name property of an Employee object, your target object is the , the target property is the property, the value to use is Name, and the source object is the Employee object. - 目標屬性必須是相依性屬性。The target property must be a dependency property. 這也表示您無法繫結欄位。This also means that you cannot bind a field. 大部分屬性物件相依性屬性，而且大部分的相依性屬性，唯讀的除了預設支援資料繫結。Most properties of objects are dependency properties and most dependency properties, except read-only ones, support data binding by default. (僅類型可以定義相依性屬性以及所有物件都衍生自。)(Only types can define dependency properties and all objects derive from .) - 雖然圖中未指出，但應該注意的是，繫結來源物件不限於自訂的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 物件。Although not specified in the figure, it should be noted that the binding source object is not restricted to being a custom [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 資料繫結支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] 物件和 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 格式的資料。 data binding supports data in the form of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] objects and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]. 若要提供一些範例，可能會繫結來源，任何清單物件、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]相關聯的物件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)]資料或 Web 服務或 XmlNode，其中包含您[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。To provide some examples, your binding source may be a , any list object, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object that is associated with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_adonet](~/includes/tlasharptla-adonet-md.md)] data or Web Services, or an XmlNode that contains your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data. 使用屬性，以指定資料流程的方向。Use the property to specify the direction of the data flow. 若要偵測來源變更單向或雙向繫結中，來源必須實作適合的屬性變更通知機制，例如。To detect source changes in one-way or two-way bindings, the source must implement a suitable property change notification mechanism such as . 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 實作屬性變更通知](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md)。For an example, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md). 屬性會指定來源更新的時機。The property specifies the timing of source updates. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 基本資料繫結概念 」 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Basic Data Binding Concepts" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正常的行為 (當這個屬性是`false`) 包含特殊待遇的物件。The normal behavior (when this property is `false`) includes special treatment for objects. 在此情況下，繫結引擎會評估相對於取自物件屬性。In this case, the binding engine evaluates the relative to the object obtained from the property. 此外，繫結會接聽事件及據以回應。In addition, the binding listens for the event and reacts accordingly. 將此屬性設定為`true`會覆寫這個行為，並提供繫結存取的屬性物件本身。Setting this property to `true` overrides this behavior and gives the binding access to properties of the object itself.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ Converter { System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ value); };
member this.Converter : System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the converter to use.

span.span: Gets or sets the converter to use.
A value of type .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結會隱含地使用預設轉換子，會嘗試執行類型轉換的來源值與目標值之間。A binding implicitly uses a default converter that tries to do a type conversion between the source value and the target value. 如果無法進行轉換，預設轉換器會傳回 `null`。If a conversion cannot be made, the default converter returns `null`. 如果您想要繫結相關聯的自訂值轉換器，您應該建立類別可實作介面，並提供實作和方法。If you want to associate a custom value converter with a binding, you should create a class that implements the interface and supply implementations for the and methods. 值轉換器可以將資料從一種類型變更為另一個、 文化特性的詳細資訊，例如字元集之間進行轉換，或修改其呈現方式的其他層面。Value converters can change data from one type to another, translate between cultural details such as character sets, or modify other aspects of their presentation. 一般轉換案例的範例，請參閱 「 資料轉換 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For examples of typical conversion scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: Gets or sets the culture in which to evaluate the converter.

span.span: Gets or sets the culture in which to evaluate the converter.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定這個屬性，繫結引擎會使用`Language`繫結目標物件的屬性。If you do not set this property, the binding engine uses the `Language` property of the binding target object. 在 [[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]這預設為"EN-US"，或繼承自] 頁面上，根項目 （或任何項目） 的值，如果已明確設定。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] this defaults to "en-US" or inherits the value from the root element (or any element) of the page, if one has been explicitly set. 資料轉換的相關資訊，請參閱中的資料轉換 」 一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For information about data conversion, see the Data Conversion section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來指定如何轉換物件。You can use the property to specify how an object is converted. 這個屬性會將其他資訊傳遞至您在繫結使用的轉換器。This property passes additional information to a converter that you use on a binding. 當您指定，值會傳遞至並方法為`parameter`參數。When you specify a , the value is passed to the and methods as the `parameter` parameter. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 產生值清單中的繫結項目為基礎](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-produce-a-value-based-on-a-list-of-bound-items.md)。For an example, see [How to: Produce a Value Based on a List of Bound Items](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-produce-a-value-based-on-a-list-of-bound-items.md). 該範例示範如何實作但仍適用於使用方式。That example shows an implementation of an but the usage still applies.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DoNothing As Object

summary.span: Used as a returned value to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.

span.span: Used as a returned value to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結來源屬性或轉換子可以傳回指示繫結引擎不要執行任何動作。A binding source property or a converter can return to instruct the binding engine not to perform any action. 例如，若要指示繫結引擎不要將值傳輸到繫結目標，不必移至下一個中，或不使用`FallBackValue`或預設值。For example, to instruct the binding engine not to transfer a value to the binding target, not to move to the next in a , or not to use the `FallBackValue` or default value.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要繫結至您的應用程式中的另一個項目的屬性，此屬性相當實用。This property is useful when you want to bind to the property of another element in your application. 比方說，如果您想要使用控制的應用程式中的另一個控制項的高度或如果您想要繫結的控制項屬性您控制項。For example, if you want to use a to control the height of another control in your application, or if you want to bind the of your control to the property of your control. 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果已設定的屬性。By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set. 不過，屬性是其中一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源並覆寫繼承的資料內容。However, the property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a and override the inherited data context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 指定繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 並的屬性類別也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。The and properties of the class also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly. 不過，只有三個屬性，其中， ，和、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。However, only one of the three properties, , , and , should be set for each binding, or a conflict might occur. 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援的附加的屬性使用方式附加屬性。This method supports attached property usage for the attached property. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 命名空間管理員會繫結中的資料來源時，才適用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]繫結來源 (物件)。 namespace managers are relevant only if the data in the binding came from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source ( object). 如果命名空間管理員未特別套用原始資料來源建立，或是藉由後續呼叫繫結，則這個方法會傳回`null`。If a namespace manager was not specifically applied either in the original data source creation or by subsequently calling on the binding, then this method will return `null`. 這個方法一律會傳回`null`如果繫結背後的資料不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]。This method will always return `null` if the data behind the binding is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)].

span.span: The parameter cannot be .

summary.span: Used as the of to indicate that an indexer property has changed.

span.span: Used as the of to indicate that an indexer property has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAsync { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAsync : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the should get and set values asynchronously.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the should get and set values asynchronously.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性時`get`您繫結來源屬性的存取子可能需要很長的時間。Use the property when the `get` accessor of your binding source property might take a long time. 其中一個範例是使用的映像屬性`get`從網路下載的存取子。One example is an image property with a `get` accessor that downloads from the Web. 設定要`true`可避免[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時進行下載。Setting to `true` avoids blocking the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] while the download occurs. 等候要送達的值，報告繫結，如果有的話，或預設值繫結的目標屬性。While waiting for the value to arrive, the binding reports the , if one is available, or the default value of the binding target property. 不過，不應該有許多的情況下，您需要使用屬性。However, there should not be many scenarios where you need to use the property. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)]指導方針，建議您不要定義速度較慢的欄位集合會比的屬性。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] guidelines recommend against defining properties that are orders of magnitude slower than a field set would be. 當您建立您的類別時，請考慮將處理的速度非常慢的作業之外`get`存取子，並快取的結果。When you are creating your class, consider handling extremely slow operations outside of the `get` accessor and caching the result. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 選擇之間的屬性和方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af)。For more information, see [NIB: Choosing Between Properties and Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55825e8f-7e2e-448a-9505-7217cc91b1af).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Data::BindingMode Mode { System::Windows::Data::BindingMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Data::BindingMode value); };
member this.Mode : System.Windows.Data.BindingMode with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow in the binding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the direction of the data flow in the binding.
One of the values.

value.span: 預設值是，它會傳回目標相依性屬性的預設繫結模式值。

span.span: The default is , which returns the default binding mode value of the target dependency property.

value.span: 不過，每個相依性屬性的預設值都會不同。

span.span: However, the default value varies for each dependency property.

value.span: 一般而言，使用者可編輯的控制項屬性 (例如文字方塊和核取方塊的控制項屬性) 預設為雙向繫結，而其他大多數屬性則預設為單向繫結。

span.span: In general, user-editable control properties, such as those of text boxes and check boxes, default to two-way bindings, whereas most other properties default to one-way bindings.

value.span: 判斷相依性屬性預設是否會單向或雙向繫結的程式設計方式是，使用 取得屬性的屬性中繼資料，然後檢查 屬性的布林值。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine whether a dependency property binds one-way or two-way by default is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the Boolean value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援並繫結，基礎資料必須實作。To support and bindings, the underlying data must implement . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作屬性變更通知](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md)。For details, see [How to: Implement Property Change Notification](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-property-change-notification.md). 針對或是繫結，您可以設定來控制目標至來源更新屬性。For or bindings, you can control the target-to-source updates by setting the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如需有關不同的繫結模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information on the different binding modes, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果繫結具有與它相關聯，則繫結引擎會檢查每個規則，每次將目標屬性值傳輸到 [來源] 屬性。If the binding has associated with it, the binding engine checks each rule each time it transfers the target property value to the source property. 如果規則導致無效的值，就會建立繫結引擎物件，並將它加入至。If a rule invalidates a value, the binding engine creates a object and adds it to the . 繫結物件的集合。collection of the bound object. 當屬性不是空的之物件的附加的屬性設定為`true`。When the property is not empty, the attached property of the object is set to `true`. 如果的屬性設為`true`，然後繫結引擎會引發附加物件上的事件。If the property of the is set to `true`, then the binding engine raises the attached event on the object. 如需驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱中的資料驗證一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::PropertyPath ^ Path { System::Windows::PropertyPath ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::PropertyPath ^ value); };
member this.Path : System.Windows.PropertyPath with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the path to the binding source property.

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the binding source property.
The path to the binding source.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個繫結通常會有四個元件： 繫結目標物件、 目標屬性、 繫結來源和在要使用的繫結來源值的路徑。Each binding typically has these four components: a binding target object, a target property, a binding source, and a path to the value in the binding source to use. 如需有關這些資料繫結概念的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information about these data binding concepts, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 使用屬性來指定您想要繫結來源值：Use the property to specify the source value you want to bind to: - 在最簡單的案例中，屬性值是使用繫結，例如來源物件的屬性名稱`Path=PropertyName`。In the simplest case, the property value is the name of the property of the source object to use for the binding, such as `Path=PropertyName`. - 類似於 C# 中使用的語法可以指定子屬性的屬性。Subproperties of a property can be specified by a syntax similar to that used in C#. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` 會將繫結設定為物件或屬性 `ShoppingCart` 的子屬性 `Order`。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart.Order` sets the binding to the subproperty `Order` of the object or property `ShoppingCart`. - 若要繫結至附加屬性，請在附加屬性前後加上括號。To bind to an attached property, place parentheses around the attached property. 例如，若要繫結至附加屬性，語法是`Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`。For example, to bind to the attached property , the syntax is `Path=(DockPanel.Dock)`. - 屬性的索引子可以在方括弧內指定，接在套用索引子的屬性名稱後面。Indexers of a property can be specified within square brackets following the property name where the indexer is applied. 例如，子句 `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` 會將繫結設定為索引，而該索引對應於屬性之內部索引處理常值字串 "0" 的方式。For instance, the clause `Path=ShoppingCart[0]` sets the binding to the index that corresponds to how your property's internal indexing handles the literal string "0". 也支援多個索引子。Multiple indexers are also supported. - `Path` 子句中可以混合使用索引子和子屬性；例如，`Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].`Indexers and subproperties can be mixed in a `Path` clause; for example, `Path=ShoppingCart.ShippingInfo[MailingAddress,Street].` - 您可以在索引子內加入多個以逗號 (,) 分隔的索引子參數。Inside indexers you can have multiple indexer parameters separated by commas (,). 各個參數的型別可以使用括號指定。The type of each parameter can be specified with parentheses. 例如，您可以加入 `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`，其中 `sys` 對應至 `System` 命名空間。For example, you can have `Path="[(sys:Int32)42,(sys:Int32)24]"`, where `sys` is mapped to the `System` namespace. - 當來源為集合檢視時，就可以使用斜線 (/) 指定目前的項目。When the source is a collection view, the current item can be specified with a slash (/). 例如，子句 `Path=/` 會將繫結設定為檢視中目前的項目。For example, the clause `Path=/` sets the binding to the current item in the view. 如果來源為集合，這個語法就會指定預設集合檢視目前的項目。When the source is a collection, this syntax specifies the current item of the default collection view. - 屬性名稱和斜線可以組合用來周遊本身為集合的屬性。Property names and slashes can be combined to traverse properties that are collections. 例如，`Path=/Offices/ManagerName` 會指定來源集合目前的項目，其中包含同樣為集合的 `Offices` 屬性。For example, `Path=/Offices/ManagerName` specifies the current item of the source collection, which contains an `Offices` property that is also a collection. 其目前項目為包含 `ManagerName` 屬性的物件。Its current item is an object that contains a `ManagerName` property. - 另外，可以使用句號 (.) 路徑來繫結至目前的來源。Optionally, a period (.) path can be used to bind to the current source. 例如，`Text="{Binding}"` 等於 `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`。For example, `Text="{Binding}"` is equivalent to `Text="{Binding Path=.}"`. 如需路徑語法的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 繫結宣告概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)或是[PropertyPath XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For information about path syntax, see [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md) or [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]繫結，請參閱屬性。For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] bindings, see the property. 若要繫結至整個物件，您不需要指定屬性。To bind to an entire object, you do not need to specify the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 指定的路徑以值 」 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Specifying the Path to the Value" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範樣式觸發程序建立報告驗證錯誤訊息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. Setter 值繫結至目前的錯誤內容(使用樣式) 使用屬性。The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style) using the property. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#5)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the binding source by specifying its location relative to the position of the binding target.

span.span: Gets or sets the binding source by specifying its location relative to the position of the binding target.

value.span: A物件，指定要使用的繫結來源的相對位置。

span.span: A object specifying the relative location of the binding source to use.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性常用的物件的一個屬性繫結至相同的物件，另一個屬性，或在樣式或範本中定義繫結。This property is commonly used to bind one property of an object to another property of the same object, or to define a binding in a style or template. 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果已設定的屬性。By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set. 不過，屬性是其中一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源並覆寫繼承的資料內容。However, the property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a and override the inherited data context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 指定繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 和屬性也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。The and properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly. 不過，只有三個屬性，其中， ，和、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。However, only one of the three properties, , , and , should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur. 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict. 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [RelativeSource 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範樣式觸發程序建立報告驗證錯誤訊息。The following example shows a style trigger that creates a that reports a validation error message. Setter 值繫結至目前的錯誤內容(使用樣式) 使用屬性。The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current (the using the style) using the property. 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#5)] 若要查看完整的範例，請參閱[繫結驗證範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972)。To see the full example, see [Binding Validation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，繫結繼承所指定的資料內容`DataContext`如果已設定的屬性。By default, bindings inherit the data context specified by the `DataContext` property, if one has been set. 不過，屬性是其中一種方式，您可以明確設定的來源並覆寫繼承的資料內容。However, the property is one of the ways you can explicitly set the source of a and override the inherited data context. 如果您不需要的功能建立的範圍中的數個屬性都繼承相同的資料內容，您可以使用屬性而非`DataContext`屬性。If you do not need the functionality of establishing a scope in which several properties inherit the same data context, you can use the property instead of the `DataContext` property. 和屬性也可讓您設定的繫結來源明確。The and properties also enable you to set the source of the binding explicitly. 不過，只有三個屬性，其中， ，和、 應該設定為每個繫結，或可能會發生衝突。However, only one of the three properties, , , and , should be set for each binding, or a conflict can occur. 如果繫結來源衝突，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。This property throws an exception if there is a binding source conflict. 若要清除此屬性，將它設定為。To clear this property, set it to . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Data::UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback ^ UpdateSourceExceptionFilter { System::Windows::Data::UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Data::UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

span.span: Gets or sets a handler you can use to provide custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

summary.span: This is only applicable if you have associated an with your binding.

span.span: This is only applicable if you have associated an with your binding.

value.span: 提供自訂邏輯以處理繫結引擎在更新繫結來源值期間所遇到之例外狀況的方法。

span.span: A method that provides custom logic for handling exceptions that the binding engine encounters during the update of the binding source value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是內建驗證規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間擲回例外狀況。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions thrown during the update of the binding source property. 如果您已建立關聯與您物件，您可以使用這個屬性設定來提供自訂邏輯來處理這些例外狀況處理常式。If you have associated the with your object, you can use this property to set a handler to provide custom logic for handling these exceptions. 如果中未指定，則繫結引擎會建立發生例外狀況並將它加入繫結元素的集合。If an is not specified on the , the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. ## Examples 屬性的下列是資料繫結來源屬性`Age3`型別的`int`。The property of the following is data-bound to a source property `Age3` that is of type `int`. 檢查 （例如，當使用者輸入的值無法轉換成整數） 的來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。The checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property (such as when the user enters a value that cannot be converted to an integer). [!code-xaml[BindValidation#tbExceptionFilter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tbexceptionfilter)] 您可以提供自訂邏輯以處理這些例外狀況。You can provide custom logic to handle those exceptions. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來設定。The following example shows how to use the property to set an . [!code-csharp[BindValidation#filtercallback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filtercallback)] 以下是範例實作。The following is an example implementation of an . [!code-csharp[BindValidation#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] 也可以傳回`null`，例外狀況本身，或。The can also return `null`, the exception itself, or a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如需完整的範例，請參閱[繫結驗證範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972)。For the complete sample, see [Binding Validation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159972).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the timing of binding source updates.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the timing of binding source updates.
One of the values.

value.span: 預設值是，它會傳回預設目標相依性屬性的值。

span.span: The default is , which returns the default value of the target dependency property.

value.span: 不過，大部分的相依性屬性的預設值是，雖然屬性有預設值是。

span.span: However, the default value for most dependency properties is , while the property has a default value of .

value.span: 程式設計的方式，來決定預設值相依性屬性的值是要取得的屬性使用的屬性中繼資料，然後檢查的值屬性。

span.span: A programmatic way to determine the default value of a dependency property is to get the property metadata of the property using and then check the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結或接聽目標屬性中的變更，並將它們傳播回來源。Bindings that are or listen for changes in the target property and propagate them back to the source. 這種情況稱為更新來源。This is known as updating the source. 通常，每當目標屬性變更時，就會發生這些更新。Usually, these updates happen whenever the target property changes. 這是正常核取方塊和其他簡單控制項，但它通常不是適用於文字欄位。This is fine for check boxes and other simple controls, but it is usually not appropriate for text fields. 之後每個按鍵動作可能會降低效能，並拒絕使用者的一般機會按退格鍵和修正輸入錯誤的新值之後才更新。Updating after every keystroke can diminish performance and it denies the user the usual opportunity to backspace and fix typing errors before committing to the new value. 因此，預設值的值屬性是而非。Therefore, the default value of the property is and not . 如果您設定值加入，您必須呼叫方法或所做的變更將不會傳播回來源。If you set the value to , you must call the method or the changes will not propagate back to the source.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidatesOnDataErrors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidatesOnDataErrors : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the .

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the .
to include the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性提供替代使用項目明確。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是內建驗證規則會檢查所引發的錯誤來源物件的實作。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for errors that are raised by the implementation of the source object. 如果會引發錯誤，就會建立繫結引擎發生錯誤並將它加入繫結元素的集合。If an error is raised, the binding engine creates a with the error and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 錯誤缺乏會清除這個驗證回應，除非另一個規則就會發出驗證問題。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用並來驗證使用者輸入在。The following examples uses and to validate user input in a . 第一個範例會建立資料型別可實作報告驗證錯誤。The first example creates a data type that implements to report validation errors. [!code-csharp[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#IDataErrorInfoData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/csharp/data.cs#idataerrorinfodata)] [!code-vb[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#IDataErrorInfoData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#idataerrorinfodata)] 下列範例會繫結`Age`屬性，以並設定要`true`上。The following example binds the `Age` property to the and sets to `true` on the . 當使用者輸入無效的值時，在出現的紅色框線而報告的錯誤訊息。When the user enters an invalid value, a red border appears in the and the reports the error message. [!code-xaml[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#IDataErrorInfoXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/csharp/window1.xaml#idataerrorinfoxaml)]

to include the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性提供替代使用項目明確。Setting this property provides an alternative to using the element explicitly. 是內建驗證規則會檢查來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。The is a built-in validation rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the source property. 如果擲回例外狀況，就會建立繫結引擎與例外狀況並將它加入繫結元素的集合。If an exception is thrown, the binding engine creates a with the exception and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 錯誤缺乏會清除這個驗證回應，除非另一個規則就會發出驗證問題。The lack of an error clears this validation feedback, unless another rule raises a validation issue. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用來驗證使用者輸入在。The following examples use to validate user input in a . 第一個範例會建立資料型別會擲回例外狀況時`Age`屬性設定為無效的屬性。The first example creates a data type that throws an exception when the `Age` property is set to an invalid property. [!code-csharp[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#ThrowExceptionData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/csharp/data.cs#throwexceptiondata)] [!code-vb[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#ThrowExceptionData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#throwexceptiondata)] 下列範例會繫結`Age`屬性，以並設定要`true`上。The following example binds the `Age` property to the and sets to `true` on the . 當使用者輸入無效的值時，在出現的紅色框線而報告的錯誤訊息。When the user enters an invalid value, a red border appears in the and the reports the error message. [!code-xaml[BindingValidationAttributesSnippets#ThrowExceptionXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/bindingvalidationattributessnippets/csharp/window1.xaml#throwexceptionxaml)]

summary.span: Gets a collection of rules that check the validity of the user input.

A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將建立關聯與您或物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 您可以建立自訂規則，藉由衍生自類別，並實作方法，或者您可以使用內建，這會使失效值，如果在來源更新期間有例外狀況。You can create custom rules by deriving from the class and implementing the method, or you can use the built-in , which invalidates a value if there are exceptions during source updates. 繫結引擎會檢查每個每次輸入的值 （繫結目標屬性值） 會傳送到繫結來源屬性的繫結相關聯。The binding engine checks each associated with a binding each time an input value (the binding target property value) is transferred to the binding source property. 如需驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱中的資料驗證一節[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see the Data Validation section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 此屬性可以在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能使用集合語法所示，或藉由存取的集合物件，使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。This property can be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] only by using the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`. 要存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀，而該集合本身是讀寫。The property to access the collection object is read-only, whereas the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreValidationRules**oneOrMoreValidationRules* 一或多個物件。One or more objects. 您可以使用類別或子類別化來建立自訂規則類別。You can use the class or create custom rules by subclassing the class.

summary.span: Gets or sets an query that returns the value on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source to use.

span.span: Gets or sets an query that returns the value on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] binding source to use.
The query.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當繫結來源時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料，而非[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，而不是使用屬性屬性，表示要使用的繫結來源值的路徑。When the binding source is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data instead of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, the property is used instead of the property to indicate the path to the value on the binding source to use. 藉由設定屬性，您會建立`XPath`查詢，以選取的節點的集合 (並都是衍生自)。By setting the property, you are creating an `XPath` query to select a node or a collection of nodes ( and both derive from ). 已[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，這表示您可以使用其屬性的繫結屬性。 is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, which means you can bind to its properties using the property. 方法會處理`XPath`中的運算式屬性。The method handles the `XPath` expressions from the property. `XPath` 不支援函式。`XPath` functions are not supported. 針對`XPath`運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱文件和範例 > 一節中提供一些範例。For `XPath` expression information, see the documentation and some examples provided in the Example section. LINQ to XML 物件並請勿使用`XPath`。LINQ to XML objects and do not use `XPath`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 繫結至 XDocument、 XElement 或 LINQ 的 XML 查詢結果](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xdocument-xelement-or-linq-for-xml-query-results.md)。For details, see [How to: Bind to XDocument, XElement, or LINQ for XML Query Results](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-xdocument-xelement-or-linq-for-xml-query-results.md).
